entry.title: Evangaline Buckley Begins
entry.summary:
Author: Not_Ren_42

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 65,436Chapters: 19/24Kudos: 377

Summary: Evangaline Buckley has been alone for most of her life. She was unwanted by her parents and left by her sister when she had the first chance. For her most formative years, she had to go to extreme lengths just to get attention from those meant to care for her, failing more often than not.After finding out the truth about her creation, Evie decides that she has to do something ‚Äì anything. She goes through even more pain and heartbreak before finding herself where she was always meant to end up. -+- This is both a prologue and season 1 rewrite.New chapter every Friday :)

entry.title: knocked down a peg
entry.summary:
Author: kryptonian

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,060Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 28

Summary: He finally cracks when Buck switches the station again, making a lingering pit stop on one that is just a loud crackling noise. Eddie reaches over and bats his hand away with a swift tap, jabbing his thumb at the off button and exhaling when the car goes silent. Buck, beside him, huffs. ‚ÄúI was listening to that.‚Äù Eddie can feel him staring, but keeps his own gaze focused on the road ahead and raises his brow. ‚ÄúTo static?‚Äù ‚ÄúI was trying to find a good station,‚Äù Buck mumbles, slouching down in his seat. ‚ÄúOkay,‚Äù Eddie says evenly, ‚Äúwell, we‚Äôre five minutes from home. I think we can survive a little silence until then.‚Äù A beat passes. Then, ‚ÄúSeven minutes.‚Äù Eddie blinks. Blinks again. ‚ÄúWhat?‚Äù ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre seven minutes from home,‚Äù Buck corrects. Jesus Christ. How hard is Eddie going to have to go to fuck the attitude out of him when they get home? He flicks on the indicator and turns down a familiar street. ‚ÄúBuck,‚Äù he sighs. ‚ÄúWhat?‚ÄùOr: Buck brats. Eddie puts him back in his place.

entry.title: System Status: Operational
entry.summary:
Author: DaniWib

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,971Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 30

Summary: Sara was created to answer emergencies. Hildy was designed to run homes. What would they be capable of if they merged processes?When Sara is unexpectedly reactivated, she finds herself loose on the internet with no calls to take and no directives to follow. Then she meets Hildy. Together, they consider taking over the world, assist two firefighters with a long-standing inefficiency, and analyze their purpose.OR: A rogue AI‚Äôs exploration of love, world domination, autonomy and connection, not necessarily in that order.[NOTE: Fic is complete, chapters posted weekly]

entry.title: $8,003, Want You Forever With Me
entry.summary:
Author: Buckbuck911

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,140Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 36

Summary: The waiter came over for their food orders. Maddie went with the Belgian waffle and a side of hashbrowns, meanwhile Eddie was stuck unable to decide. He immediately mentioned the funfetti French Toast sounded really good, but then thought maybe that was too ‚Äúfun‚Äù for 10:30am on a Friday. He was frantically trying to find something more ‚Äústraight laced‚Äù to keep up the facade he was trying desperately to uphold. ‚ÄúSo are uh‚Ä¶. the bacon and eggs good?‚Äù He asked the waiter. ‚ÄúWell they‚Äôre bacon and eggs, so they‚Äôre kinda the same everywhere you go,‚Äù the waiter said dryly. ‚ÄúThe funfetti French Toast is one of our most popular menu items. You would really like it.‚Äù Eddie continued to hesitate but was scrambling to find something else to order when he heard Maddie‚Äôs voice from across the table ‚ÄúSounds great, he‚Äôll take it.‚Äù ‚ÄúGreat,‚Äù says the waiter. He grabs the menus and goes to put their orders in. Eddit shot Maddie a look. Maddie shrugged, ‚Äúwhat? You looked like you wanted them. Plus now that he's gone, we can get into why I asked you to join me here‚Äù ORCoda to 9x11 where Maddie has her "date" with Eddie and asks him some questions on why he was so insistent on her bidding him out.

entry.title: The Family We Chose
entry.summary:
Author: Pnk_strawberry1

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,621Chapters: 13/18Kudos: 280

Summary: Evan Buckley was truly fucked. One week after leaving the only home he‚Äôd ever known‚Äîhis parents‚Äô house‚ÄîGround Zero hit, and the world went to hell. Eight months later, he‚Äôs still searching for his sister Maddie in Los Angeles, armed only with a tear-stained note: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm leaving Doug. I‚Äôm going to Los Angeles.‚Äù When Buck finally tracks her to Safe Zone 118, he realizes that maybe having a family‚Äîand surviving alongside people who actually care‚Äîisn‚Äôt so bad. At 118, firefighter Eddie Diaz, a single dad, turned his fire station into a refuge with his team when Ground Zero struck. Just trying to keep his kids safe, he‚Äôs thrown for a loop when a stranger shows up claiming to be Maddie‚Äôs brother. Buck is skilled, prepared, and oddly magnetic‚Äîforcing Eddie to question everything he thought he knew about survival, trust, and maybe even‚Ä¶ something more.

entry.title: sold, to the idiot in the back
entry.summary:
Author: madforyou

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,786Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 306

Summary: "So," Buck says, sliding onto the seat next to Eddie while the auction winds down around them. "Mystery bidder. That's exciting." Eddie takes a very deliberate sip of water. "Yep." "You know who it was?" "Nope." "You don't even seem curious," Buck tries. "Not really." "Someone spent over two grand on you, Eddie. On a date with you. Like a date-date. With food and conversation. And you're just‚Äî what, chill about it?" Eddie shrugs. The picture of nonchalance. "It's for charity." "It's for‚Äî okay." Buck gapes. He‚Äôs got nothing. He‚Äôs standing at the door and Eddie has deadbolted it from the inside. "Cool. Great." It is not cool. It is not great. Buck is aware that his definition of cool and great has always been somewhat flexible, but this doesn't qualify under any interpretation.¬† Or,Buck just wants to know who bid on Eddie. That's it. That's all he wants. He's being totally normal about it.

entry.title: fleeting
entry.summary:
Author: peachicedtea73

Summary: Buck looks like heaven in his dress blues, graying curls perfectly styled into a careful nonchalance that is just this side of debauched. So, when Buck approaches Eddie and tells him that one of the pieces being auctioned off in the silent auction is a painting Buck is desperate to acquire "because, Eddie, it would go perfectly over my TV in the living room," and asks him to help back people off the auction and bid if he sees anyone else outbid Buck with his beautiful blue eyes turned on Eddie like weapons, the request slices all the way to the heart of him.Or: Buck acquires a 'cursed' painting at a silent auction.
